messages.message: My new sandboxes are finally working! I still had to comment out everything in `tools/connectors/dev-setup.sh` because it checks for connections of dependent services and make `cs build` hang forever with `rpc error: code = Unknown desc = context deadline exceeded` errors

Full message:
```make: Entering directory '/home/owner/instabase/tools/connectors'
mkdir -p /home/owner/instabase/tools/connectors/tmp

WORKLOAD FEATURE TARGET STATUS
WORKLOAD   FEATURE         TARGET         STATUS   
opensearch Cluster Network crafting-aihub » Pending
dev        Cluster Network crafting-aihub » Pending
mysql      Cluster Network crafting-aihub » Pending

...

dev        Cluster Network crafting-aihub » Pending                                                                                                                
                                            E connection error: desc = "transport: Error while dialing: rpc error: code = Unknown desc = context deadline exceeded"
                                            E rpc error: code = Unknown desc = context deadline exceeded     ```
I think it has to do with connecting with dependent services, not the actual build itself :thinking_face:
just checked i think every sandbox has this error too, mine is the same

maybe raise this to crafting eng?
https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C05L87V014J/p1745073351331269?thread_ts=1744738026.435019&cid=C05L87V014J

i don't have access to talk to them.
